text: Alexei Nikolayevich Kalyuzhny (, ) (born June 13, 1977) is a Belarusian former professional ice hockey forward. He last played for HC Dinamo Minsk of the Kontinental Hockey League. He participated at the 2010 IIHF World Championship as a member of the Belarus National men's ice hockey team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Avangard Omsk players Category:Belarusian ice hockey centres Category:Expatriate ice hockey players in Russia Category:HC Dinamo Minsk players Category:HC Dynamo Moscow players Category:Metallurg Magnitogorsk players Category:HC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Lokomotiv Yaroslavl players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Belarus Category:Severstal Cherepovets players Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:Yunost Minsk players
title: Alexei Kalyuzhny
